description: Skill activation triggers for Claude Code. Controls when skills automatically suggest or block actions.

skill-developer.description: Meta-skill for creating and managing Claude Code skills

frontend-dev-guidelines.description: React/TypeScript best practices including MUI v7 compatibility

route-tester.description: Testing authenticated API routes with JWT cookie-based auth

error-tracking.description: Sentry error tracking and performance monitoring patterns

nextjs-shadcn-reactflow.description: Next.js App Router projects using shadcn/ui, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, and React Flow builders

redis-patterns.description: Redis caching strategies, pub/sub messaging, rate limiting, distributed locks, session management, and data structure patterns using ioredis

postgres-optimization.description: PostgreSQL query optimization, window functions (ROW_NUMBER, RANK, LEAD/LAG), table partitioning, indexing strategies, EXPLAIN ANALYZE, CTEs, and performance tuning

shadcn-patterns.description: shadcn/ui component patterns, Radix primitives, Tailwind CSS theming, form handling with react-hook-form and zod, accessible UI components, and customization strategies

nextjs-patterns.description: Next.js 14+ App Router patterns, Server Components, Server Actions, data fetching with cache/revalidation, routing (parallel, intercepting, groups), middleware, and performance optimization

tomtom-maps.description: TomTom Maps APIs and SDKs for location-based services including Maps Display, Search/Geocoding, Routing/Navigation, and Traffic

framer-motion.description: Framer Motion (Motion for React) animation library patterns including motion components, variants, gestures, transitions, layout animations, and scroll animations

zustand-state.description: Zustand state management for React - store creation, selectors, middleware (persist, devtools, immer), slices pattern, and TypeScript patterns

maplibre-animation.description: MapLibre GL JS patterns for real-time vehicle tracking with smooth arc-length interpolation along polyline tracks. Covers Turf.js integration, train animation, and eliminating marker teleporting.

tailwindcss.description: Tailwind CSS v4 utility-first framework patterns including responsive design, state variants, dark mode, flexbox/grid layouts, @theme customization, and modern CSS features

react-hooks.description: Comprehensive React hooks mastery - useState vs useReducer decisions, effect patterns, performance optimization with useMemo/useCallback, React 19 hooks (useActionState, useOptimistic, use), and custom hook patterns

inngest.description: Inngest event-driven durable execution platform for background jobs, workflows, and step functions. Covers function creation, step orchestration, flow control (concurrency, throttling, rate limiting, debounce), error handling, retries, batching, and middleware patterns.

ai-sdk-agents.description: Building production AI agents with Vercel AI SDK. Covers tool calling, multi-step reasoning, streaming, memory systems, multi-agent orchestration, ReAct patterns, and production best practices.

firecrawl.description: Firecrawl web scraping and crawling API for extracting clean markdown/HTML from websites. Covers scraping, crawling, batch operations, structured data extraction with LLM, deep research, and LLMs.txt generation.

convex-realtime.description: Convex reactive database and sync engine for building real-time applications. Covers queries, mutations, actions, schemas, indexes, real-time subscriptions, TypeScript patterns, and best practices for live-updating apps.

testing-patterns.description: Comprehensive testing patterns for React/TypeScript with Vitest, React Testing Library, Playwright E2E, and MSW v2 mocking

auth-patterns.description: Authentication patterns for Next.js with Auth.js v5 and Clerk covering sessions, protected routes, OAuth, and multi-provider setup

trpc-patterns.description: Type-safe API development with tRPC v11 covering router setup, procedures, React Query integration, and Next.js App Router

drizzle-orm.description: Type-safe SQL with Drizzle ORM covering schema definition, queries, relations, migrations, and database patterns

stripe-payments.description: Stripe payment integration for subscriptions, checkout, webhooks, and customer management

email-patterns.description: Transactional email patterns with Resend and React Email for building and sending emails

enforcement_types.suggest: Skill suggestion appears but doesn't block execution
enforcement_types.block: Requires skill to be used before proceeding (guardrail)

priority_levels.low: Optional - Trigger only for explicit matches

customization.pathPatterns: Adjust to match your project structure (blog-api, auth-service, etc.)
customization.keywords: Add domain-specific terms relevant to your project
customization.intentPatterns: Use regex for flexible user intent matching
